name: D.I.N.O
description:
Description
I started to develop this game in December and I adapted it to be able to play it from the browser and participate in my first game jam Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3 , it is still in development, i hope you like the progress I have made.
Controls
D - Run
Espace - Jump
X - start/reset

Special Thank
 to my girlfriend for always being supportive in this development and
https://www.instagram.com/yime.ilustraciones/ thanks for helping to create and improve the sprite
Credits
https://iznaut.itch.io/bfxr - Tool to make effects/sound
https://freemusicbyjames.itch.io/songsloops - Music
https://arks.itch.io/dino-characters - Sprite
https://edermunizz.itch.io/ - Background
https://jehal.itch.io - Platformer
